entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as the one who is looking around into the pitch dark and gripping Harry's elbow very hard. He is also mentioned as saying 'Oh no' multiple times.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one who is listening to something big moving in the distance. He is also mentioned as saying 'Shut up' and 'What d'you think it's doing?'.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is described as being heard by Ron, implying that Fang is making some noise that can be heard by others.

entities.name: something big
entities.description: Something big is described as moving in the distance and snapping branches as it carves a path through the trees. It is also mentioned as being heard by Ron.

relationships.description: Ron is gripping Harry's elbow very hard, indicating that he has physical contact with Harry.
Ron hears something big moving in the distance, implying that he can perceive it through his senses.
Harry listens to something big moving in the distance, indicating that he is aware of its presence.
Ron hears Fang making some noise, implying that Fang's sounds can be perceived by others.
